lgp.core.environment

Class DefaultValueProviders

  • lgp.core.environment.DefaultValueProviders

  • public class DefaultValueProviders

    A collection of useful interface DefaultValueProvider implementations.

    See Also:
    interface DefaultValueProvider

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DefaultValueProviders INSTANCE
      A collection of useful interface DefaultValueProvider implementations.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> DefaultValueProvider<T> constantValueProvider(T value)
      A interface DefaultValueProvider that always returns the value it is initialised with.
      static <T> DefaultValueProvider<T> lambdaValueProvider(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<? extends T> func)
      A interface DefaultValueProvider that executes the given function when a value is requested.
      static DefaultValueProvider<java.lang.Double> randomDoubleValueProvider(java.util.Random randomState)
      A interface DefaultValueProvider that gives a random, uniformly distributed double value in [0.0, 1.0).

    • Method Detail

      • constantValueProvider

        public static <T> DefaultValueProvider<T> constantValueProvider(T value)

        A interface DefaultValueProvider that always returns the value it is initialised with.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of value that this provider gives.
        Parameters:
        value - The value the provider should give.
        See Also:
        interface DefaultValueProvider

      • randomDoubleValueProvider

        public static DefaultValueProvider<java.lang.Double> randomDoubleValueProvider(java.util.Random randomState)

        A interface DefaultValueProvider that gives a random, uniformly distributed double value in [0.0, 1.0).

        See Also:
        interface DefaultValueProvider

      • randomGaussianValueProvider

        public static DefaultValueProvider<java.lang.Double> randomGaussianValueProvider(java.util.Random randomState)

        A interface DefaultValueProvider that gives a random, normally distributed value with mean 0.0 and std. dev. 1.0.

        Returns:
        A provider that gives a random double value.
        See Also:
        interface DefaultValueProvider

      • lambdaValueProvider

        public static <T> DefaultValueProvider<T> lambdaValueProvider(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<? extends T> func)

        A interface DefaultValueProvider that executes the given function when a value is requested.

        This allows for arbitrary logic to be provided by simply giving a lambda function that can be executed.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of value that this provider gives.
        Parameters:
        func - A function that takes no arguments and returns a value in the domain of T.
        Returns:
        A provider that gives the result of a function execution as its value.
        See Also:
        interface DefaultValueProvider
